name: email-service-integration-tests
description: Integration tests for Email Service API using Postman and Newman

scripts.test: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --reporters cli,json,html --reporter-json-export test-results.json --reporter-html-export test-report.html
scripts.test:ci: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --reporters cli,json --reporter-json-export test-results.json
scripts.test:email: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --folder 'Email Sending' --reporters cli
scripts.test:attachments: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --folder 'Attachment Management' --reporters cli
scripts.test:errors: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --folder 'Error Scenarios' --reporters cli
scripts.test:admin: newman run Email_Service_Postman_Collection.json -e Postman_Test_Environment.json --folder 'Admin Functions' --reporters cli
scripts.setup: npm run install:newman && echo 'Newman CLI installed successfully'

author: Email Service Team
